title: Country in stage three of demographic transition

content.question: Which of the following countries is best described as being at Stage 3 of the demographic transition model?

choices.label: Democratic Republic of the Congo: birth rate = 44, death rate = 10
Ivory Coast: birth rate = 37, death rate = 13

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
